-- Create Camera device --http://VERA_IPADDRESS:3480/data_request?id=action&serviceId=urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:HomeAutomationGateway1&action=CreateDevice& --deviceType=urn:schemas-upnp-org:device:DigitalSecurityCamera:2&internalID=&Description=Amcrest%20Camera& --UpnpDevFilename=D_DigitalSecurityCamera2.xml&UpnpImplFilename=I_Amcrest_ProHD.xml&MacAddress=&RoomNum=0&Reload=1&IpAddress=CAM-IPADDRESS
-- Create Motion sensor device --http://VERA_IPADDRESS:3480/data_request?id=action&serviceId=urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:HomeAutomationGateway1&action=CreateDevice& --deviceType=urn:schemas-micasaverde-com:device:MotionSensor:1&internalID=&Description=Camera%20motion%20sensor& --UpnpDevFilename=D_MotionSensor1.xml&UpnpImplFilename=&IpAddress=&MacAddress=&RoomNum=0&Reload=1&DeviceNumParent=CAMERA-DEVICE-ID*
-- Motion sensor device AutoUnTrip --http://VERA_IPADDRESS:3480/data_request?id=variableset&serviceId=urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:SecuritySensor1&Variable=AutoUntrip&Value=60&DeviceNum=SENSOR-DEVICE-ID
-- Force set credentials --http://VERA_IPADDRESS:3480/data_request?id=variableset&DeviceNum=CAMERA-DEVICE-ID&Variable=username&Value=USERID --http://VERA_IPADDRESS:3480/data_request?id=variableset&DeviceNum=CAMERA-DEVICE-ID&Variable=password&Value=PASSWORD
--delete device --http://VERA_IPADDRESS:3480/data_request?id=device&action=delete&device=SENSOR-DEVICE-ID
local CAM_SID = "urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:Camera1" local HAD_SID = "urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:HaDevice1" local SES_SID = "urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:SecuritySensor1" local lug_device
--Enable motion detect (true/false) function DetectionEnable(action) local status, page, code = luup.inet.wget("http://" .. lug_ip .. "/cgi-bin/configManager.cgi?action=setConfig&MotionDetect[0].Enable=" .. action,5,lug_username,lug_password)
if status ~= 0 then luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") Motion sensor action error. code: " .. code) return 1 end
return 0 end
--Enable IVS Rule (true/false) VideoAnalyseRule[0][1] function IVSRuleEnable(action) local status, page, code = luup.inet.wget("http://" .. lug_ip .. "/cgi-bin/configManager.cgi?action=setConfig&VideoAnalyseRule[0][1].Enable=" .. action,5,lug_username,lug_password)
if status ~= 0 then luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") Motion sensor IVSRuleEnable action error. code: " .. code) return 1 end
return 0 end
--Enable SmartMotionDetect (true/false) function SmartMotionDetectEnable(action) local status, page, code = luup.inet.wget("http://" .. lug_ip .. "/cgi-bin/configManager.cgi?action=setConfig&SmartMotionDetect[0].Enable=" .. action,5,lug_username,lug_password)
if status ~= 0 then luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") Motion sensor SmartMotionDetect action error. code: " .. code) return 1 end
return 0 end
function lug_startup(lul_device)
lug_device = lul_device
luup.set_failure(false)
-- Check if we have the correct category number. if (luup.devices[lul_device].category_num ~= 6) then luup.attr_set("category_num", "6", lul_device) end
-- Get username, password and IP lug_username = luup.devices[lul_device].user or luup.variable_get(CAM_SID, "username", lul_device) or "" lug_password = luup.devices[lul_device].pass or luup.variable_get(CAM_SID, "password", lul_device) or "" lug_ip = luup.devices[lul_device].ip or ""
-- Set default snapshot URL lug_path = luup.variable_get(CAM_SID, "URL", lul_device) or "" if (lug_path == "") then luup.variable_set(CAM_SID, "URL", "/cgi-bin/snapshot.cgi", lul_device) end
-- Set default Streams lug_path = luup.variable_get(CAM_SID, "Streams", lul_device) or "" if (lug_path == "") then luup.variable_set(CAM_SID, "Streams", "rtsp,rtsp,/cam/realmonitor?channel=1&subtype=0;rtsp_low,rtsp,/cam/realmonitor?channel=1&subtype=1", lul_device) end
-- Set supported camera features (full_screen) and update the 'Commands' variable with the available commands. local commands = "camera_full_screen,camera_archive_snapshot"
luup.variable_set("urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:HaDevice1", "Commands", commands, lul_device)
end

action.name: SetArmed
action.run:
luup.variable_set(SES_SID, "Armed", lul_settings.newArmedValue, lul_device)
local Camera = luup.devices[lul_device].device_num_parent local SensorState = luup.variable_get(SES_SID, "Armed", lul_device) local Status = 0 local Outcome = 4
-- Get username, password and IP from camera device lug_username = luup.devices[Camera].user or luup.variable_get(CAM_SID, "username", Camera) or "" lug_password = luup.devices[Camera].pass or luup.variable_get(CAM_SID, "password", Camera) or "" lug_ip = luup.devices[Camera].ip or ""
if tonumber(SensorState) == 1 then -- set armed, enable motion and IVS detection in camera Status = DetectionEnable("true")
if Status == 0 then luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") Motion sensor armed") else luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") Motion sensor failed to arm") Outcome = 2 end
Status = IVSRuleEnable("true")
if Status == 0 then luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") IVS sensor armed") else luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") IVS sensor failed to arm") Outcome = 2 end
Status = SmartMotionDetectEnable("true")
if Status == 0 then luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") SmartMotionDetect sensor armed") else luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") SmartMotionDetect sensor failed to arm") Outcome = 2 end
else -- set unarmed, disable motion and audio detection in camera Status = DetectionEnable("false")
if Status == 0 then luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") Motion sensor disarmed") else luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") Motion sensor failed to disarm") Outcome = 2 end
Status = IVSRuleEnable("false")
if Status == 0 then luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") IVS sensor disarmed") else luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") IVS sensor failed to disarm") Outcome = 2 end
Status = SmartMotionDetectEnable("false")
if Status == 0 then luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") SmartMotionDetect sensor disarmed") else luup.log("Camera Motion Sensor ip: " .. lug_ip .. " (".. luup.devices[lul_device].description .."::State=".. SensorState ..") SmartMotionDetect sensor failed to disarm") Outcome = 2 end end
--return success (4), or later failure (2) return Outcome
